column6: All of our employees are in  US.  We are a municipal government organization.  Our staff are hourly in the sense that they are eligible for overtime, with the exception of 4 managers out of about 30 total staff.  Approximately 5 out of 30 are limited term employees which include our student interns and seasonal assistance.
